channel.title: Getting some info from other site
channel.description:
Well I'm making this site that you can see the goals in current hockey games. I want it to get the goals and then show them on my page. Is it possible? If you could iframe a certain place it would be the best but the place where im trying to get it is [url=http://www.sm-liiga.fi/]sm-liiga[/url] When posting it had Lukko - TPS klo. 18.30 or something. I want it to show that, but there might be more games on different days.
Thanks

item.title: Getting some info from other site
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

my host does, but it doesn’t allow fsocketopen

Read full topic

item.title: Getting some info from other site
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:2, topic:175916”]Yeah you need to open the site with php.

fopen

Then parse the data.

Search google.[/quote]
That’s what I was thinking
Just gotta see if my host allows it.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah you need to open the site with php.

fopen

Then parse the data.

Search google.
